OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD PHARMACY SYRINGE NEEDLE EXCHANGE SCHEME

Desc.entry: A scheme run in conjunction with NHS Sheffield, Sheffield Drug Alcohol Action Team and Turning Point Exchange. Participating chemists are: Wicker Pharmacy, Wicker; Abbeydale Phararmacy, 715-717 Abbeydale Road; Boots, West Street; Boots, 66 The Moor; Boots, 50 Manor Park centre; The Co-operative Pharmacy, 287 Prince of Wales Road; Weldrick's Chemist, 150 Crookes; L Rowland & Co., 827 Barnsley Road; Lloyds Pharmacy, 3-7 Alderson Road; Lloyds Pharmacy, 52 Birley Moor Road; Lloyds Pharmacy, 7-9 Sunderland Street; Lloyds Pharmacy, 190 Duke Street; Lloyds Pharmacy, 1 Market Square, Woodhouse; Lloyds Pharmacy, Unit 4, Westfield Centre. Where the general public come across needle waste, they should contact Streetforce on 0114 273 4567.
